meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Richie Rodriguez Jay Ben Markson Beau Henson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6344.

td.p: Richie Rodriguez, a mechanical engineer from Hayward, California
Jay Ben Markson, an actor originally from Lakeville, Massachusetts
Beau Henson, a test prep teacher and actor originally from Mt. Carmel, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,002)

tr.td: THE MARQUIS DE SADE
FACTS & FIGURES
PLACES TO EAT
RUNNING ON "N.T."
THE FIRST EPISODE
WHERE ON EARTH...?
